lead_paragraph: A last-minute deal allows work to continue for three weeks while the Veterans Affairs Department tries to meet congressional demands for a scaled-back project.

headline.print_headline: Rockies; Colorado: Work Goes On at V.A. Hospital Site
headline.main: Colorado: Work Goes On at V.A. Hospital Site

snippet: A last-minute deal allows work to continue for three weeks while the Veterans Affairs Department tries to meet congressional demands for a scaled-back project.
abstract: Congress gives Veterans Affairs Dept last-minute reprieve to avoid construction shutdown of its partly finished hospital in Aurora, Colo, but VA must come up with hundreds of millions of dollars to finish project and meet congressional demands that it not raise federal deficit or take services from other veterans.
